question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Achanakamar- Amarkantak Biosphere Reserve?
1. It extends across the states of Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh.
2. It is a part of UNESCO Man And Biosphere Programme.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
Achanakamar- Amarkantak Biosphere Reserve extends across the states of Madhya Pradesh (Anupur and
Dindori districts) and Chhattisgarh (Bilaspur district). Â It is a part of UNESCO Man And Biosphere Programme
